lines:
10 April, 1919.

Mr. Sung Sing Kwan

536 Commonwealth Ave.

Boston, Mass.

lity dear Kvan:

Your mighty nice letter has just reached me. The cushion 
cover arrived at the house this iming before I left for the office;

and I can aesure you that they are vor deeply agrr acl at ed, all the more

so in view of the fact that they

are designed and embroidered by your

little sigt sr. I think that ir 30 famerican girl at the age of fourteon

in excellence 
or fifteen should accomplish something anywxe nsarly approaching/the 
190 rk your sist sr has done she would be acy srtis od from md to end of this 
country as an infant prodigy. The covers will always serve 29 a most 
delightful reminder of a most delightful occasion, and for that reason 
wi12 hava a double value.

By all means come out someting, and talk over with me the 
big problem which now confronts you in connection with your father's ex -
pressed wishes. I don't wonder that you feel a bit at a loss to know 
just what to do. Don's decide hurri edly anyway.

Ever sincerely yours,
raw: 10 April, 1919. Mr. Sung Sing Kwan 536 Commonwealth Ave. Boston, Mass. lity dear Kvan: Your mighty nice letter has just reached me. The cushion cover arrived at the house this iming before I left for the office; and I can aesure you that they are vor deeply agrr acl at ed, all the more so in view of the fact that they are designed and embroidered by your little sigt sr. I think that ir 30 famerican girl at the age of fourteon in excellence or fifteen should accomplish something anywxe nsarly approaching/the 190 rk your sist sr has done she would be acy srtis od from md to end of this country as an infant prodigy. The covers will always serve 29 a most delightful reminder of a most delightful occasion, and for that reason wi12 hava a double value. By all means come out someting, and talk over with me the big problem which now confronts you in connection with your father's expressed wishes. I don't wonder that you feel a bit at a loss to know just what to do. Don's decide hurri edly anyway. Ever sincerely yours,

metadata.abstract: Letter complimenting the embroidered cushion cover made by Kwan's sister and offer to speak to Kwan about the big problem" with Kwan's father's expressed wishes for Kwan.""etter complimenting the embroidered cushion cover made by Kw"
